backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that fetches metal prices from the IBJA rates URL every 10 seconds using HTTP outcalls and a recurring timer, with a transform function for response canonicalization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (error UI removal, fallback prices, market-closed detection, and subtle market-closed indicators) to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing component responsibilities, hooks behavior, and configuration constants.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file that imports Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app that mounts the application into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by stacking BrandTicker, MetalTicker, FloatingCallButton, HeroSection, LiveRatesDashboard, ProductsSection, ContactSection, SocialMediaAssets, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/BrandTicker.tsx: Simple presentational component rendering the 'GURURAJ BULLION' brand name as a large, centered, gradient-background headline with rainbow ticker styling.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section card that displays a WhatsApp phone number and a chat button linking to wa.me, with a semi-transparent refinery interior background image.
frontend/src/components/FloatingCallButt: Draggable floating button fixed in the viewport that initiates a phone call via a tel: link, distinguishing drag gestures from tap/click using a 5px distance threshold and persisting position in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing the current year copyright and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM parameters derived from the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with a full-bleed furnace background image, dark gradient overlay, and animated headline/subtext content centered over the image.
frontend/src/components/LiveRatesDashboa: React component that displays live IBJA gold and silver metal rates in a dashboard layout with market open/closed status, loading skeleton, and a manual refresh button.
frontend/src/components/MetalTicker.tsx: React ticker component showing live IBJA gold and silver prices with trend indicators (up/down/neutral) and market open/closed status, tracking price changes between renders.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Memoized card component displaying a precious metal product with its image, purity levels, and optional available formats, styled for gold or silver themes.
Section component rendering a grid of silver and gold ProductCards alongside refinery process images with overlay captions.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaAsset: Section component that previews and provides a download button for a 1080Ã—1080 Instagram sponsorship image promoting live gold and silver rates.
frontend/src/config/api.ts: Exports API configuration constants for the IBJA rates endpoint, backend fetch interval (10s), and request timeout (8s).
frontend/src/config/fallback.ts: Defines fallback INR prices for gold and silver (Kolkata rates) and price variation ranges used when live scraping fails.
frontend/src/config/refresh.ts: Exports React Query refresh settings: 10-second refetch interval, 9-second stale time, and background refetch enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity or actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches live gold/silver prices from the IBJA API, falls back to static fallback prices on failure, calculates GST breakdowns, and sets a marketClosed flag if prices haven't changed for 60+ minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet using Tailwind CSS with OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, metallic gold/silver color tokens, and utility animations including a ticker scroll.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/ibja.ts: TypeScript interfaces for IBJA rates data, individual metal price entries, and the combined metal prices dataset including GST and market status fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom border radii, gold/silver box shadows, Inter font, and animation keyframes; includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for the Gururaj Bullion app tracking implemented features (silent fallback prices, market-closed indicator) and pending architectural requirements around error-free price display.
